tools.name: click_element
tools.description: Click an element on the current page using CSS selector, XPath, or text content

tools.name: navigate_to_url
tools.description: Navigate to a URL in the current tab or a new tab

tools.name: fill_form
tools.description: Fill form fields on the current page

tools.name: submit_form
tools.description: Submit a form on the current page

tools.name: read_page_content
tools.description: Read the text content or HTML of the current page

tools.name: switch_tab
tools.description: Switch to a different browser tab

tools.name: read_file
tools.description: Read the contents of a file

tools.name: write_file
tools.description: Write content to a file (creates file if it doesn't exist, overwrites if it does)

tools.name: list_directory
tools.description: List files and directories in a given path

tools.name: google_search
tools.description: Perform a Google search and return results

tools.name: execute_python
tools.description: Execute simple Python code in a sandboxed environment
